column1: The '''Mithril Armoury''' was a website selling ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|Lord of the Rings]]'' film merchandise. In particular
column2: they sold the [[Middle-earth Enterprises|officially licensed]] swords
column4: staves and shields produced by [http://www.unitedcutlery.com United Cutlery]
column5: as well as some non-official [[J.R.R. Tolkien|Tolkien]]-inspired material.

column1: The Mithril Armoury was well-known to collectors and has a solid reputation (albeit slightly mysterious) as a dealer of Tolkien-related products. It was a regular advertiser in [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bi-monthly bulletin

column3: and re-opening was planned on [[1 July|July 1]]
column5: and a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chapter_7%2C_Title_11%2C_United_States_Code Chapter 7] bankruptcy was filed in October.
